titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for full benefits for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/15/2015--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to provide for full benefits for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age or any previous reduction in OASDI benefits.
Declares that there shall be no reduction in the widow's or widower's insurance benefit of an individual for any month in which such individual is under a disability.
